attributes.action: encourage people to cycle by requesting the EU allow the removal of VAT on bicycles, tricycles and human powered vehicles and on all cycling parts and spares, and that once permission from the EU has been received, they remove the appropriate VAT charges.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For reasons of health and in order to reduce carbon emissions from transport, the Government should take a bold and tangible step to support the view that cycling is good for those who do it and good for everyone else as well. Cyclists should be rewarded for their contribution to reducing carbon emissions by not having to pay VAT for their bicycles, tricycles and human powered vehicles, nor for the spares and parts required to keep them running.
